juzs.text: 78|1|Tamen huxiang xunwen, xunwen shenme?
78|2|Xunwen na zhongda de xiaoxi,
78|3|jiushi tamen suo zhenglun de xiaoxi.
78|4|Jue buran! Tamen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
78|5|Jue buran, tamen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
78|6|Nandao wo meiyou shi da di ru yaolan,
78|7|shi shanluan ru mu zhuang ma?
78|8|Wo ceng ba nimen zaocheng pei'ou,
78|9|wo ceng shi nimen cong shuimian zhong dedao xiuxi,
78|10|wo ceng yi heiye wei weimu,
78|11|wo yi baizhou gong mousheng,
78|12|wo ceng zai nimen shangmian jianzaole qi ceng jiangu de tian,
78|13|wo chuangzao yi zhan mingdeng,
78|14|wo cong hanshui de yun li, jiangxia pangtuo dayu,
78|15|yibian wo jie ta er shengchu bai gu he caomu,
78|16|yiji maomi de yuanpu.
78|17|Panjue zhi ri, que shi zhiding de riqi,
78|18|zai na ri, haojiao jiang bei chui xiang, nimen jiu cheng qun er lai;
78|19|tian jiang bei kaipi, you xuduo menhu;
78|20|shanluan jiang bei yidong, er bian cheng huanying;
78|21|huo yu que shi cihouzhe.
78|22|Ta shi beini zhe de guisu;
78|23|tamen jiang zai qizhong douliu changjiu de shiqi.
78|24|Tamen zai qizhong buneng shuimian, bude yinliao,
78|25|Zhi yin feishui he nong zhi.
78|26|Na shi yige hen shidang de baochou.
78|27|Tamen dique bupa qingsuan,
78|28|tamen ceng fouren wo de jixiang,
78|29|wo ceng jiang wanshi jilu zai yi ben tian jing li.
78|30|(Jiang dui tamen shuo:) Nimen changshi ba! Wo zhi zengjia nimen suo shou de xingfa.
78|31|Jingwei de renmen bi youyi zhong shouhuo,
78|32|xuduo yuanpu he putao,
78|33|he liang ru yuanrun, nianling huayi de shaonu,
78|34|he man bei de liquan.
78|35|Tamen zai nalimian ting bu dao e yan he huanghua.
78|36|Na shi cong ni de zhu fachu de baochou——chongzu de shangci.
78|37|Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi zhiren de zhu, tamen bu gan xiang ta chen shuo.
78|38|Zai jingshen he zhong tianshi pai ban suli zhi ri, tamen bude shuohua, wei zhiren de zhu suo texu erqie neng shuo zheng hua de, cai gan fayan.
78|39|Na shi bi you de rizi, shei yiyu, shei jiu qu ze yige xiang ta de zhu de guisu.
78|40|Wo dique jinggao nimen yi zhong linjin de xingfa, zai na ri, ge ren jiangyao kanjian ziji suo yi zuo de gongzuo, bu xindao de renmen jiangyao shuo: A! Dan yuan wo yuan shi chentu.
79|1|Shi yi ji che de,
79|2|qing ye de,
79|3|benchi de,
79|4|xianqu de,
79|5|juece de,
79|6|dang zhendong zhe zhendong,
79|7|er xu fa zhe xu fa zhi ri,
79|8|zai na ri, xuduo xin jiang tantebu'an,
79|9|xuduo yan jiang bu gan yangshi.
79|10|Tamen shuo: Women biding fuyuan ma?
79|11|Na shi zai women yibian cheng xiu gu de shihou ma?
79|12|Tamen shuo: Ranze, na shi yici kui she de fuyuan.
79|13|Na zhishi yici housheng,
79|14|tamen huran zai dimian zhi shang.
79|15|Mu sa de gushi yi lailin nile ma?
79|16|Dangshi, ta de zhu, ceng zai sheng gu du wa zhong zhaohuan ta shuo:
79|17|“Ni dao falao na li qu ba! Ta que shi beini de.
79|18|Ni dui ta shuo:“Ni yuanyi chengwei chunjie de ren ma?
79|19|Ni yuanyi wo yindao ni renshi ni de zhu, er ni jingwei ta ma?”
79|20|Ta ba na zuida de jixiang zhaoshile falao,
79|21|dan ta fouren, erqie weikang.
79|22|Ranhou zhuanshen er benzou.
79|23|Yushi, zhaoji minzhong, erqie hanjiao,
79|24|shuo:“Wo shi nimen zhizun de zhu.”
79|25|Gu an la yihou shi he jinshi de xingfa chengzhi ta.
79|26|Duiyu weiju de renmen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jianjie.
79|27|Nimen shi geng nan zao ne? Haishi tian shi geng nan zao de ne? Ta ceng jianzaole tian,
79|28|ta sheng qi ta de gaodu, er chengquan ta de xingti,
79|29|ta shi ta de yejian hei'an, bing xian chu ta de guangming.
79|30|Cihou, ta jiang dimian zhankai,
79|31|ta shi dimian yong chu quanshui lai, shengchu zhiwu lai.
79|32|Ta shi shanluan wending,
79|33|yi bian nimen he nimen de shengchu huode xiangshou.
79|34|Da nan lailin de shihou,
79|35|jiushi ren jiang ji qi ziji suozuo de shan e,
79|36|huo yu jiang wei neng jian de ren xianlu chulai de rizi.
79|37|Beini,
79|38|erqie xuanze jinshi shenghuo de ren,
79|39|huo yu bi wei ta de guisu.
79|40|Zhiyu pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shoushen wen, bing jiechu siyu de ren,
79|41|leyuan bi wei ta de guisu.
79|42|Tamen wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou shixian,
79|43|ni zen neng shuoming ta ne?
79|44|Weiyou ni de zhu neng zhi ta de jiujing.
79|45|Ni de jinggao zhiyou bi yu weiju ta de ren,
79|46|tamen zai jian ta di na ri, haoxiang zai fen li zhi douliuguo yi zhao huo yi xi.
80|1|Ta ceng zhoumei, erqie zhuanshen li qu,
80|2|yinwei nage mangren lai dao ta de mianqian.
80|3|Ni zen neng zhidao ne? Ta yexu neng shou xuntao,
80|4|huo ting zhonggao, er meng jiaoyi.
80|5|Zhiyu ziman zhe,
80|6|ni dou fengying ta,
80|7|ta bu shou xuntao, yu ni he gan?
80|8|Zhiyu yinqin de lai qingjiao ni,
80|9|erqie xinhuai jingwei zhe,
80|10|ni que daiman ta.
80|11|Jue buran! Zhe que shi yi zhong jiaoxun.
80|12|Shei yu songdu ta, jiu jiao shei songdu ta ba
80|13|ta zai zhengui de ceye li;
80|14|naxie ceye, shi bei chengyang de, shi bei di jing de,
80|15|shi zai xuduo shuji de shou li de;
80|16|naxie shuji, shi zungui de, shi shanliang de.
80|17|Gaisi de ren! Ta shi hedeng de wang'en!
80|18|An la ceng yong shenme chuangzao ta de ne?
80|19|Shi yong jingye. Ta ceng chuangzao ta, bing yuding ta fayu de chengxu.
80|20|Ranhou, ta shi ta de daolu pingyi.
80|21|Ranhou, ta shi ta si, bing anzang ta.
80|22|Ranhou, dang ta yiyu de shihou, ta shi ta fuhuo.
80|23|Jue buran, ta hai meiyou fengxing tasuo mingling ta de shiwu.
80|24|Jiao ren guancha ziji de shiwu ba!
80|25|Wo jiang yushui da liang di qingzhu xialai.
80|26|Ranhou, wo shi dimian qiyi di lie kai,
80|27|wo zai da dishang shengchan bai gu,
80|28|yu putao he muxu,
80|29|yu ganlan he hai zao,
80|30|yu maomi de yuanpu,
80|31|shuiguo he mucao,
80|32|yi gong nimen he nimen de shengchu xiangshou.
80|33|Dang zhen'eryulong de hong sheng lailin de shihou,
80|34|zai na ri, ge ren jiang taobi ziji de dixiong,
80|35|ziji de fumu,
80|36|ziji de qi zi er nu;
80|37|zai na ri, ge ren jiang zigubuxia;
80|38|zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi guanghua de,
80|39|shi xi xiao de, shi yukuai de;
80|40|zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shang, jiang you huichen,
80|41|lihei jiang mengbi ta.
80|42|Zhe deng ren, shi bu xindao de, shi huangyin de.
81|1|Dang taiyang an chu de shihou,
81|2|dang xingsu lingluo de shihou,
81|3|dang shanluan bengkui de shihou,
81|4|dang yun tuo bei paoqi de shihou,
81|5|Dang yeshou bei jihe de shihou,
81|6|dang haiyang pengpai de shihou,
81|7|dang linghun bei peihe de shihou,
81|8|dang bei huomai de nuhai bei xunwen de shihou:
81|9|Ta weisheme zuiguo er zao shahai ne?
81|10|Dang gongguo bao bei zhankai de shihou,
81|11|dangtian pi bei jie qu de shihou,
81|12|dang huo yu bei ranzhe de shihou,
81|13|dang leyuan bei song jin de shihou,
81|14|mei geren dou zhidao ta suozuoguo de shan e.
81|15|Wo shi yi yunxing de zhong xing
81|16|moluo de xingxing,
81|17|he shiqu shi de heiye,
81|18|zhaoyao shi de zaochen,
81|19|zhe que shi yige zungui de shizhe de yanci,
81|20|ta zai baozuo de zhu nali, shi you quanli de, shi you diwei de,
81|21|shi zhongwangsuogui, erqie zhongyu zhishou de.
81|22|Nimen de pengyou, bushi yige feng ren,
81|23|ta que yi kanjian nage tianshi zai mingxian de tianbian,
81|24|ta dui youxuan bushi lin jiao de.
81|25|Zhe bushi bei fangzhu de emo de yanci,
81|26|nimen jiang wang nali qu ne?
81|27|Zhe zhishi duiyu zhong shijie de jiaohui——
81|28|dui yu nimen zhong yu xunguidaoju zhe de jiaohui,
81|29|nimen bu yu xunguidaoju, chufei an la——zhong shijie de zhu——yiyu de shihou.
82|1|Dang cangqiong polie de shihou,
82|2|dangzhong xing piao duo de shihou,
82|3|dang haiyang hunhe de shihou,
82|4|dang fenmu bei jie kai de shihou,
82|5|mei geren dou zhidao ziji qian qianhou hou suo zuo de yiqie shiqing.
82|6|Ren a! Shenme dongxi yinyou ni beilile ni de renci de zhu ne?
82|7|Ta ceng chuangzaole ni, ranhou, shi ni jianquan, ranhou, shi ni yunchen.
82|8|Ta yiyu shenme xingshi, jiu yi shenme xingshi er gouzao ni.
82|9|Jue buran, dan nimen fouren baoying!
82|10|Nimen de shangmian, que you xuduo jianshi zhe,
82|11|tamen shi zungui de, shi jilu de,
82|12|tamen zhidao nimen de yiqie xingwei.
82|13|Shan renmen, bi zai enze zhong;
82|14|e renmen, bi zai liehuo zhong.
82|15|Tamen jiang zai baoying ri duo ru liehuo,
82|16|tamen jue bude likai ta.
82|17|Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
82|18|Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
82|19|Zai na ri, renhe ren dui renhe ren buneng you she me biyi; zai na ri, mingling quan gui an la.
83|1|Shang zai! Cheng liang bugong de renmen.
83|2|Dang tamen cong bieren cheng liang jinlai de shihou, tamen cheng liang de hen chongzu;
83|3|dang tamen liang gei bieren huo cheng gei bieren de shihou, tamen bu cheng zu bu liang zu.
83|4|Nandao tamen buxin ziji jiang fuhuo,
83|5|zai yige zhongda de rizi ma?
83|6|Zai na ri, renmen jiang wei quan shijie de zhu er qili.
83|7|Jue buran, e renmen de ce bao que zai senji ni zhi zhong.
83|8|Ni zen neng zhidao senji ni shi shenme?
83|9|Shi yi ben fengcun de bao zi.
83|10|Zai na ri, shang zai fouren de renmen.
83|11|Fouren baoying ri de renmen!
83|12|Zhiyou mei ge guofen de fanzui de ren, fouren ta.
83|13|Dang bieren dui ta xuandu wo de tian jing de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi guren de gushi.”
83|14|Jue buran, dan tamen suo fan de zui'e, yi xiang xiu yiyang mengbi tamen de xin.
83|15|Zhen de, zai na ri, tamen bi shou zulan, bude jinjian tamen de zhu.
83|16|Ranhou, tamen bi duo ru liehuo zhi zhong.
83|17|Ranhou, huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen suo fouren de.”
83|18|Zhen de, shan renmen de ce bao zai en lin yi zhong.
83|19|Ni zen neng zhidao en lin yi shi shenme?
83|20|Shi yi ben fengcun de bao zi,
83|21|an la suo qinjin de tianshimen jiang zuozheng ta.
83|22|Shan renmen bi zai enze zhong,
83|23|kao zai chuangshang zhushizhe,
83|24|ni neng zai tamen de mianmu shang renshi enze de guanghua.
83|25|Tamen jiang yin fengcun de tian chun,
83|26|feng ping kou de, shi shexiang. Jiao tan ai zhe zhong xingfu de renmen, zhengxian wei shan ba!
83|27|Tian chun de hunhewu, shi you tai si ni mu lai de,
83|28|na shi yi dong quanshui, an la suo qinjin de ren jiang yin ta.
83|29|Fanzui de renmen changchang chaoxiao xinshimen,
83|30|dang xinshimen cong tamen de mianqian zouguo de shihou, tamen yi mu huxiang shiyi;
83|31|dang tamen hui jia de shihou, yangyang deyi di huiqu;
83|32|dang tamen yujian xinshimen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe deng ren que shi mi wu de.”
83|33|Tamen meiyou bei pai qu jianshi xinshimen.
83|34|Gu jinri xinshimen, chaoxiao bu xindao de renmen,
83|35|tamen kao zai chuangshang zhushizhe,
83|36|bu xindao de renmen yi huode tamen de xingwei de baochoule ma?
84|1|Dangtian zhan lie,
84|2|tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
84|3|dangdi zhankai,
84|4|bing pao qi suo huai, erqie bian wei kongxu,
84|5|tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
84|6|ren a! Ni biding mianli gongzuo, zhidao huijian ni de zhu, ni jiang kan dao ziji de laoji.
84|7|Zhiyu yong youshou jieguo gongguo bu zhe,
84|8|jiang shou jianyi de jihe,
84|9|er xinggaocailie de fan yu ta de jiashu;
84|10|zhiyu cong beihou jieshou gongguo bu zhe,
84|11|jiang jiaokuliantian,
84|12|ru yu liehuo zhi zhong,
84|13|congqian ta zai jiashu jian yuan shi kuaile de,
84|14|ta yi caixiang ta jue bu hui gui yu zhu.
84|15|Buran, ta de zhu, yuan shi jian cha ta de.
84|16|Wo yi wanxia mengshi,
84|17|yi heiye ji qi baoluowanxiang de mengshi,
84|18|yi yuanman shi de yueliang mengshi,
84|19|nimen biding zaoyu chongchong de zainan.
84|20|Tamen zen neng bu xindao ne?
84|21|Dang bieren dui tamen xuandu “gulanjing” de shihou, tamen zenme bu koutou ne?
84|22|Buran, bu xindao de renmen, shi fouren zhenli de,
84|23|an la quan zhidao tamen xinzhong yincang de dongxi,
84|24|gu ni dang yi yi zhong tongku de xingfa xiang tamen baoxi,
84|25|wei xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
85|1|Shi yi you gong fen de cangqiong,
85|2|he suo jinggao de rizi,
85|3|yiji neng zheng de he suo zheng de rizi,
85|4|yuan jue keng de renmen, bei qi jue,
85|5|na keng li you ranliao dianzhe de huo,
85|6|dangshi, tamen zuo zai keng bian,
85|7|tamen jianzheng ziji dui xinshimen de zuixing,
85|8|tamen duiyu xinshimen, zhi zebei tamen xinyang an la——wanneng de, ke song de zhu,
85|9|tiandi de zhuquan zhishi ta de, an la shi jianzheng wanwu de.
85|10|Pohai xinshi hexin nu er bu huiguo de renmen, bi shou huo yu de xingfa, bing shou huozai de chengzhi.
85|11|Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, bi ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, na que shi weida de chenggong.
85|12|Ni de zhu de chengzhi, que shi yanli de.
85|13|Ta que neng chuangzao, qie neng zaizao,
85|14|ta shi zhi she de, shi zhi ai de,
85|15|shi baozuo de zhu, shi zunyan de,
85|16|shi weisuoyuwei de.
85|17|Ni ceng tingjian jundui de gushile ma?
85|18|Falao he sai mo de ren de gushi.
85|19|Buran, bu xindao de renmen xianyu fouren zhi zhong,
85|20|an la shi cong ge fangmian baoluo tamen de,
85|21|buran, zhe shi zunyan de “gulanjing”,
85|22|jilu zai yikuai shou baohu de tian pai shang.
86|1|Yi cangqiong he qi mingxing mengshi,
86|2|ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenmo?
86|3|Shi na canlan de mingxing.
86|4|Mei geren, dou youyige baohu zhe.
86|5|Ren yingdang xiang yi xiang, ta ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de?
86|6|Ta shi bei shechu de jingye zaocheng de.
86|7|Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de.
86|8|An la que shi neng shi ta fuyuan de,
86|9|na shi yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri.
86|10|Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
86|11|Yi han yu de yun,
86|12|he you feng di di fashi,
86|13|zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci,
86|14|zhe bushi xiaohua.
86|15|Tamen biding yao yong jimou,
86|16|wo ye yao yong jimou.
86|17|Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia.
87|1|Ni dang zansong ni zhigao zhu de daming chaojue wanwu,
87|2|ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi ge wu yunchen.
87|3|Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao.
87|4|Ta shengchu mucao,
87|5|ranhou shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao.
87|6|Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji,
87|7|chufei an la suo yu wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing.
87|8|Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu,
87|9|gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua.
87|10|Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu;
87|11|boming de ren, jiang tuibi,
87|12|ta jiang ru yu dahuo,
87|13|ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo.
87|14|Chunjie zhe biding chenggong,
87|15|ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong.
87|16|Buran, nimen que xuanze jinshi de shenghuo;
87|17|qishi, houshi shi geng hao de, shi geng changjiu de.
87|18|Zhe que shi zai zai gu jingdian zhong de,
87|19|zai zai yi bo la xin he mu sa de jingdian zhong de.
88|1|Da zai de xiaoxi, que yi jianglin nile,
88|2|zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren shi gongjing de,
88|3|laodong de, xinku de,
88|4|tamen jiang ru liehuo,
88|5|jiang yin fei quan,
88|6|tamen meiyou shiwu, dan you jingji,
88|7|ji bu fei ren, you buneng chongji;
88|8|zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi xiangfu de,
88|9|shi wei qi laoji er yukuai de,
88|10|tamen jiang zai chonggao de leyuan zhong,
88|11|ting bu dao e yan,
88|12|limian you liu quan,
88|13|limian you gao ta,
88|14|you chenshezhe de bei zhan,
88|15|you pailiezhe de kaozhen,
88|16|you puzhankai de rong tan.
88|17|Nandao tamen bu guancha ma? Luotuo shi zenyang zaocheng de,
88|18|tian shi zenyang bei sheng gao de,
88|19|shanluan shi zenyang bei shuli qi de,
88|20|dadi shi zenyang bei zhan kai de.
88|21|Ni dang jiaohui, ni zhishi jiaohui (tamen de),
88|22|ni jue bushi jiancha tamen de,
88|23|dan shei zhuanshen li qu erqie bu xinjiao,
88|24|an la jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi shei.
88|25|Tamen biding zhi guiyu wo,
88|26|tamen de jihe, biding you wo fuze.
89|1|Shi yi liming,
89|2|yu shi ye,
89|3|yu oushu he jishu,
89|4|yu li qu de heiye,
89|5|duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong you yi zhong mengshi ma?
89|6|Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
89|7|you gao zhu de yi lai mu ren ma?
89|8|Xiang nayang de ren, zai bie de chengshi li hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo de——
89|9|zenyang chengzhi zai shangu li zao shi wei jia de sai mo de ren,
89|10|zenyang chengzhi you wuli de falao.
89|11|Zhe deng ren ceng zai guo zhong fangsi,
89|12|nai duo xing bu yi,
89|13|gu ni de zhu ba yi zhong xingfa, qingzhu zai tamen shenshang.
89|14|Ni de zhu, que shi jianshi de.
89|15|Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu kaoyan ta, gu youdai ta, erqie shi taguo anyi de shenghuo de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu youdai wole.”
89|16|Dang ta kaoyan ta, gu jieyue ta de jiyang de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu lingru wole.”
89|17|Jue buran! Dan nimen bu youdai gu'er,
89|18|nimen bu yi jipin xiang mianli,
89|19|nimen qintun yichan,
89|20|nimen ku'ai qiancai.
89|21|Jue buran! Dang dadi zhendong fu zhendong,
89|22|ni de zhu he zhenglie zhenglie de tianshi, tong qi lailin de shihou,
89|23|zai na ri, huo yu jiang bei na lai; zai na ri, ren jiang juewu, dan juewu yu ta you he biyi ne?
89|24|Ta jiang shuo:“Dan yuan wo zaishi de shihou ceng xingshanshi.”
89|25|Zai na ri, renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong xingfa chengzhi bieren;
89|26|renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong shufu shufu bieren.
89|27|Anding de linghun a!
89|28|Ni yingdang xiyue de, bei xiyue de guiyu ni de zhu.
89|29|Ni yingdang ru zai wo de zhong pu li;
89|30|ni yingdang ru zai wo de leyuan li.
90|1|Wo yi zhege difang mengshi——
90|2|ni jiang zai nali, bu shou ji shu——
90|3|wo yi yige fuqin he tasuo sheng de zisun mengshi,
90|4|wo que yi ba ren chuangzao zai kunan li.
90|5|Ta yiwei renhe ren dou buneng zhifu ta ma?
90|6|Ta shuo:“Wo huafeile xuduo caichan!”
90|7|Ta yiwei renhe ren dou meiyou kanjian ta ma?
90|8|Nandao wo meiyou wei ta chuangzao liang zhi yanjing,
90|9|yitiao shetou, liang pian zuichun,
90|10|bing zhishi ta liang tiao mingxian de daolu ma?
90|11|Ta zenme bu chaoyue shan jing ne?
90|12|Ni zen neng zhidao chaoyue shan jing shi shenme shi?
90|13|Shi shifang nuli,
90|14|huo zai jihuang ri zhenji
90|15|qinqi de gu'er,
90|16|huo kun qiong de pinmin;
90|17|tongshi, ta shi yige xindao erqie xingshan, bing yi jianren xiang mian, yi ci min xiangzhu zhe.
90|18|Zhe deng ren shi xingfu de.
90|19|Buxin wo de jixiang zhe, shi boming de,
90|20|tamen jiang bei guan zai huo yu li.
91|1|Yi taiyang ji qi guanghui fashi,
91|2|yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
91|3|yi jieshi taiyang shi de baizhou fashi,
91|4|yi longzhao taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
91|5|yi cangqiong ji qi jianzhu zhe fashi,
91|6|yi dadi ji qi puzhan zhe fashi,
91|7|yi linghun jishi ta junheng,
91|8|bing qishi ta shan e zhe fashi,
91|9|fan peiyang ziji di xingling zhe, biding chenggong;
91|10|fan qianghai ziji di xingling zhe, biding shibai.
91|11|Sai mo de ren yi yin guofen er fouren zhenli.
91|12|Dangshi, tamen zhong zui boming zhe mang shang qian lai,
91|13|shizhe jiu dui tamen shuo:“Nimen rang an la de mu tuo ziyou yinshui ba.”
91|14|Dan tamen fouren shizhe er zaisha mu tuo, gu tamen de zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er huimie tamen, shi tamen pubian shounan.
91|15|Ta shi bu gulu na zainan de houguo de.
92|1|Yi longzhao shi de heiye fashi,
92|2|yi xianzhu shi de baizhou fashi,
92|3|yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu fashi,
92|4|nimen de xingwei, que shi butong de.
92|5|Zhiyu zhenji pinmin, jingwei an la,
92|6|qie chengren zhi shan zhe,
92|7|wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui yi de jieju.
92|8|Zhiyu linxi qiancai, zi wei wu qiu,
92|9|qie fouren zhi shan zhe,
92|10|wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui nan de jieju.
92|11|Dang ta lunwang de shihou, ta de caichan yu ta you she me biyi ne!
92|12|Wo que you zhidao de zeren,
92|13|wo que you houshi he jinshi de zhuquan.
92|14|Guwo jinggao nimen yi zhong fa yan de huo,
92|15|wei boming zhe zhui ru qizhong,
92|16|ta fouren zhenli, er beiqi zhi.
92|17|Jingwei zhe, de mian yu huoxing.
92|18|Ta qiancheng de shishe ta de caichan,
92|19|ta meiyou shouguo renhe ren de ying bao de ende,
92|20|dan ta shishe zhishi weile qiu ta de zhigao zhu de zun rong,
92|21|ta ziji jianglai biding xiyue.
93|1|Shi yi shangwu,
93|2|shi yi heiye, dang qi jijing de shihou,
93|3|ni de zhu meiyou qi jue ni, ye meiyou yuanhen ni;
93|4|houshi yu ni, que bi jinshi geng hao;
93|5|ni de zhu jiang lai bi shangci ni, yizhi ni xiyue.
93|6|Nandao ta meiyou faxian ni gukulingding, er shi ni you suo guisu?
93|7|Ta ceng faxian ni paihuai qitu, er ba ni yinru zhenglu;
93|8|ta faxian ni jiajing hanku, er shi ni yishi fengzu.
93|9|Zhiyu gu'er, ni buyao yapo ta;
93|10|zhiyu qiuzhu zhe, ni buyao hechi ta,
93|11|zhiyu ni de zhu suo ci ni de endian ne, ni yingdang xuanshi ta.
94|1|Nandao wo meiyou wei ni er kaita ni de xiongjin ma?
94|2|Wo xie xiale ni de zhongren,
94|3|ji shi ni de bei danfuguo zhong de,
94|4|er tigaole ni de shengwang,
94|5|yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi,
94|6|yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi,
94|7|dang ni de shiwu wanbi shi,
94|8|ni yingdang qinlao, ni yingdang xiang ni de zhu kenqiu.
95|1|Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo mengshi,
95|2|yi xinai shan mengshi,
95|3|yi zhege anning de chengshi mengshi,
95|4|wo que yi ba ren zaocheng juyou zuimei de xingtai,
95|5|ranhou, wo shi ta bian cheng zui beilie de;
95|6|dan xindao erqie xing shan zhe, jiang shou buduan de baochou
95|7|cihou, ni zenme hai fouren baoying ne?
95|8|Nandao an la bushi zui gongdao de panjue zhe ma?
96|1|Ni yingdang feng ni de chuangzao zhu de mingyi er xuandu,
96|2|ta ceng yong xiekuai chuangzao ren.
96|3|Ni yingdang xuandu, ni de zhu shi zui zunyan de,
96|4|ta ceng jiao ren yong bi xiezi,
96|5|ta ceng jiao ren zhidao ziji suo bu zhidao de dongxi.
96|6|Jue buran, ren que shi beini de,
96|7|yinwei ta renwei ziji shi wu qiu de.
96|8|Wanwu biding zhi guiyu ni de zhu.
96|9|Ni gaosu wo ba!
96|10|Nage jinzhi wo de puren libai de ren;
96|11|ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi zunxun zhengdao de,
96|12|huo shi ming ren jingwei de;
96|13|Ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi fouren zhenli de, beiqi zhenli de,
96|14|nandao ta hai bu zhidao an la shi jiancha de ma?
96|15|Jue buran, ruguo ta bu tingzhi, wo yiding yao zhua zhu ta de e fa——
96|16|shuohuang zhe, fanzui zhe de e fa.
96|17|Rang ta qu zhaoji ta de huizhong ba!
96|18|Wo jiang zhaoji zai ba ni tianshi
96|19|jue buran, ni buyao shuncong ta, ni yingdang wei an la er koutou, ni yingdang qinjin an la.
97|1|Wo zai na gaogui de yejian que yi jiang shi ta,
97|2|ni zen neng zhidao na gaogui de yejian shi shenme?
97|3|Na gaogui de yejian, shengguo yiqian ge yue,
97|4|zhong tianshi he jingshen, feng tamen de zhu de mingling, wei yiqie shiwu er zai na yejian jianglin
97|5|na yejian quan shi ping'an di, zhidao liming xianzhu de shihou.
98|1|Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe zhong de bu xindao zhe meiyou likai ziji yuan you de xinyang, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen.
98|2|Nage mingzheng shi an la suo paiqian de yige shizhe, ta songdu chunjie de ceye,
98|3|qizhong you xuduo zhengque de jing wen.
98|4|Xinfeng tian jing zhe, meiyou fen li, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen.
98|5|Tamen zhi fengming chongbai an la, qiancheng jingyi, keshou zhengjiao, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, zhe shi zhengjiao.
98|6|Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe, tamen zhong de bu xindao zhe, bi ru huo yu, er yong ju qizhong; zhe deng ren shi zui e de ren.
98|7|Xindao erqie xingshan de ren, shi zuishan de ren,
98|8|tamen zai tamen de zhu nali de baochou shi xia lin zhu he de changzhu de leyuan, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, an la xiyue tamen, tamen xiyue an la; zhe shi weiju an la zhe suoyou de.
99|1|Dang dadi menglie dizhen dong,
99|2|pao qi zhongdan,
99|3|renmen shuo:“Dadi zenme la?”
99|4|Zai na ri, dadi jiang baogao ta de xiaoxi.
99|5|Yinwei ni de zhu yi qishile ta;
99|6|zai na ri, renmen jiang fenfen di lisan, yibian tamen de jian ziji xingwei de baoying.
99|7|Xing yige xiao mayi zhong de shanshi zhe, jiang jian qi baochou;
99|8|zuo yige xiao mayi zhong de e shi zhe, ye jiang jian qi e bao.
100|1|Yi chuanxi er benchi de madui mengshi,
100|2|yi ti fa huohua de madui mengshi,
100|3|yi zaochen chuji,
100|4|juan qi chen'ai,
100|5|gong ru di wei de madui mengshi,
100|6|ren duiyu zhu, que shi gufu de.
100|7|Ta ziji dui na gufu que shi jianzheng de,
100|8|ta duiyu caichan que shi ku hao de.
100|9|Nandao ta bu zhidao ma? Dang fen zhong de xiu gu bei jiefa,
100|10|xiongzhong de mimi bei xianshi de shihou,
100|11|zai na ri, tamen de zhu, que shi che zhi tamen de.
101|1|Da nan,
101|2|da nan shi shenme,
101|3|ni zen neng zhidao da nan shi shenme?
101|4|Zai na ri, zhongren jiang shi fensan de fei e,
101|5|shanyue jiang shi shusong de cai rong.
101|6|Zhiyu shangong de fenliang jiao zhong zhe,
101|7|jiang zai manyi de shenghuo zhong;
101|8|zhiyu shangong de fenliang jiao qing zhe,
101|9|ta de guisu shi shen keng.
101|10|Ni zen neng zhidao shen keng li you she me?
101|11|You liehuo.
102|1|Jingsai fushu, yi shi nimen shuhu,
102|2|zhidao nimen qu you fendi.
102|3|Zhen de, nimen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
102|4|Zhen de, nimen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
102|5|Zhen de, jiaruo nimen you zhenzhizhuojian, (nimen bi bu shuhu),
102|6|nimen biding kanjian huo yu,
102|7|ranhou, nimen bi qinyan kanjian ta.
102|8|Zai na ri, nimen bi wei enze er bei shenwen.
103|1|Yi shiguang mengshi,
103|2|ren que shi zai kui she zhi zhong,
103|3|wei xindao erqie xingshan, bing yi zhenli xiangquan, yi jianren xiang mian de ren ze buran.
104|1|Shang zai! Mei ge feibang zhe, dihui zhe,
104|2|ta juji caichan, er dang zuo wuqi,
104|3|ta yiwei ta de caichan, neng shi ta bu mie.
104|4|Jue buran, ta biding yao bei tou zai huimie keng zhong.
104|5|Ni zen neng zhidao huimie keng shi shenme?
104|6|Shi an la de ranzhe de liehuo.
104|7|Neng sheng dao ren de xin shang.
104|8|Tamen biding yao bei guan zai liehuo zhong,
104|9|diao zai xuduo gao zhuzi shang.
105|1|Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chuzhi xiang de zhuren ma?
105|2|Nandao ta meiyou shi tamen de jimou, bian cheng wuyi de ma?
105|3|Ta ceng paiqian cheng qun de niao qu shang tamen,
105|4|yi niantu shi sheji tamen,
105|5|shi tamen bian cheng chi sheng de gancao yiyang.
106|1|Yinwei baohu gulai shi,
106|2|yinwei zai dongji he xiaji de luxing zhong baohu tamen,
106|3|gu jiao tamen chongjing zhe tian fang de zhu,
106|4|ta ceng wei jihuang er zhenji tamen, ceng wei kongbu er baoyou tamen.
107|1|Ni ceng jian fouren baoying ri de ren ma?
107|2|Ta jiushi nage hechi gu'er,
107|3|qie bu mianli ren zhenji pinmin de ren.
107|4|Shang zai! Libai de renmen,
107|5|tamen shi shuhu bai gong de,
107|6|tamen shi gumingdiaoyu de,
107|7|tamen shi bu ken jie ren shiwu de.
108|1|Wo que ci ni duo fu,
108|2|gu ni yingdang wei ni de zhu er libai, bing zai xisheng.
108|3|Yuanhen ni zhe, que shi juehou de.
109|1|Ni shuo:“Bu xindao de renmen a!”
109|2|Wo bu chongbai nimen suo chongbai de.
109|3|Nimen ye bu chongbai wo suo chongbai de;
109|4|wo bu hui chongbai nimen suo chongbai de,
109|5|nimen ye bu hui chongbai wo suo chongbai de;
109|6|nimen you nimen de zongjiao, wo you wo de zongjiao.”
110|1|Dang an la de yuanzhu he shengli jianglin,
110|2|dang ni kanjian zhongren cheng qun jie dui de chongfeng an la de zongjiao shi,
110|3|Ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu chaojue wanwu, bingqie xiang ta qiurao, ta que shi zhi you de.
111|1|Yuan yan fu liangshou shoushang! Ta biding shoushang,
111|2|ta de caichan, he tasuo huode de, jiang wu bi yu ta,
111|3|ta jiang ru you yan de liehuo,
111|4|ta de dan chai de qizi, ye jiang ru liehuo,
111|5|ta de jing shang xizhe yitiao jianshi de zong sheng.
112|1|Ni shuo:“Ta shi an la, shi du yi de zhu;
112|2|an la shi wanwu suo yanglai de;
112|3|ta wei shengyu, ye wei bei shengyu.
112|4|Meiyou renhe wu keyi zuo ta de pidi.”
113|1|Ni shuo:“Wo qiu bi yu shuguang de zhu,
113|2|mian zao tasuo chuangzao zhe de duhai;
113|3|mian zao heiye longzhao shi de duhai;
113|4|mian zao chui po jianjue de zhuyi zhe de duhai;
113|5|mian zao jidu zhe jidu shi de duhai.”
114|1|Ni shuo:“Wo qiu bi yu shiren de yang zhu,
114|2|shiren de junzhu,
114|3|shiren de zhuzai,
114|4|mian zao qianfu de jiaosuo zhe de duhai,
114|5|ta zai shiren de xiongzhong jiaosuo,
114|6|ta shi shuyu jingling he renlei de.
